name: SPEED UP
description:
Speed Up is a third-person runner-style arcade survival game.
Travel through the tunnel on a space shuttle skillfully avoiding obstacles and gaining points. Collect orbs to increase your movement speed and get points.
For a certain number of points, you get stars and unlock new levels, of which there are only three.
Movement on each new level is greatly accelerated and you will have to try not to crash on obstacles.
